    • Constructor Detail

      • CentrePoint

        public CentrePoint(double radius,
                   java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String colour)
        Constructor method. Used for central points in the simulation.
        Parameters:
        radius - The radius of the body (the table I used for values had radii rather than diameters).
        name - The name of the body.
        colour - The colour of the body.
